message_def.name: QueryCBRN4
message_def.description: This message queries the last CBRN4 message with ATP-45 payload or the message with specified report id.

fixed_field.name: CBRN4ReportID
fixed_field.interpretation: The report reference is an identifier associated with the CBRN Detection. 0=Last report

fixed_field.name: StationNumber
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitwise station number: 0x00000001 = Stn #1 ... 0x80000000 = Stn #32; 0=All stations

message_def.name: QueryCBRNDetection
message_def.description: This message is used to query for CBRNDetection (Message #F931).

fixed_field.name: StationNumber
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitwise station number: 0x00000001 = Stn #1 ... 0x80000000 = Stn #32; 0=All stations

message_def.name: QueryRNDetailedMeasurement
message_def.description: This message is used to query for RNDetailedMeasurement (Message #F932).

fixed_field.name: StationNumber
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitwise station number: 0x00000001 = Stn #1 ... 0x80000000 = Stn #32; 0=All stations

message_def.name: QueryCBDetailedMeasurement
message_def.description: This message is used to query for CBDetailedMeasurement (Message #F933).

fixed_field.name: StationNumber
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitwise station number: 0x00000001 = Stn #1 ... 0x80000000 = Stn #32; 0=All stations

message_def.name: QueryCBRNOperatingState
message_def.description: This message is used to query for CBRNOperatingState (Message #F934).

fixed_field.name: StationNumber
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitwise station number: 0x00000001 = Stn #1 ... 0x80000000 = Stn #32; 0=All stations

message_def.name: QueryCBRNConfiguration
message_def.description: This message is used to query for CBRNConfiguration (Message #F935).

fixed_field.name: StationNumber
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitwise station number: 0x00000001 = Stn #1 ... 0x80000000 = Stn #32; 0=All stations

message_def.name: QueryCBRNScanWindowOperatingState
message_def.description: This message is used to query for CBRNScanWindowOperatingState (Message #F936).

fixed_field.name: StationNumber
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitwise station number: 0x00000001 = Stn #1 ... 0x80000000 = Stn #32; 0=All stations

message_def.name: CBRNCommand
message_def.description: The CBRN Payload Command (Message #F927) shall be sent by the OCU to instruct a payload station to perform a given operation or function such as to start sampling. Note that it will only be logical to make one command per request message since the commands are mutually exclusive. Based on STANAG 4586; Message #0208.

fixed_field.name: Timestamp
fixed_field.interpretation: UTC POSIX-style time in seconds since 1 January 1970

fixed_field.name: StationNumber
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitwise station number: 0x00000001 = Stn #1 ... 0x80000000 = Stn #32; 0=All stations

fixed_field.name: SetPowerMode
fixed_field.interpretation: Allows for powering on or off the CBRN sensor at the given station number.

fixed_field.name: SetOperatingMode
fixed_field.interpretation: Places the CBRN payload in a given operational mode. Note that 'Standby' typically means that agent detection is not possible.

fixed_field.name: Reboot
fixed_field.interpretation: Commands the CBRN sensor at the given station number to cycle into a powering down immediately followed by a powering up of the sensor.

fixed_field.name: OperatingResetType
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the reset type that will be acted upon in OperatingResetState.

fixed_field.name: OperatingResetState
fixed_field.interpretation: Commands the CBRN sensor at the given station number to reset its operating state which is specifically identified in OperatingResetType Operating Reset Type (e.g., Reset Sieve Pack). This is not a reset of the configuration parameters.

fixed_field.name: ResetConfigurationState
fixed_field.interpretation: Commands the CBRN sensor at the given station number to reset its configuration state to the OEM defaults (ex. Display mode).

fixed_field.name: SetSamplingMode
fixed_field.interpretation: In the case of point detectors, commands the CBRN sensor at the given station number to start or stop sampling. In the case of standoff detectors, commands the CBRN sensor at the given station number to start or stop scanning as well as start or stop tracking.

fixed_field.name: TestType
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the test type that will be acted upon in SetTestMode

value_enum.enum_const: Power Distribution and Interface Logic Component Test

fixed_field.name: SetTestMode
fixed_field.interpretation: Commands the payload at the given station number to start or stop the test indicated in TestType.

fixed_field.name: SetLocalAlarmEnunciation
fixed_field.interpretation: Commands the CBRN sensor at the given station number to silence or activate local alarm (local enunciation).

fixed_field.name: SetKeyguard
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the keyguard on the payload’s input device.

fixed_field.name: SetClock
fixed_field.interpretation: UTC POSIX-style time in seconds since 1 January 1970

message_def.name: CBRNConfigurationCommand
message_def.description: The CBRN Payload Configuration Command (Message #F928) shall be sent by the OCU to instruct a given CBRN payload station to configure its parameters such as setting the payload sensitivity level. Based on STANAG 4586; Message #0209.

fixed_field.name: Timestamp
fixed_field.interpretation: UTC POSIX-style time in seconds since 1 January 1970

fixed_field.name: StationNumber
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitwise station number: 0x00000001 = Stn #1 ... 0x80000000 = Stn #32; 0=All stations

variable_length_string.name: SetExerOperName
variable_length_string.interpretation: Sets the Exercise or Operation name. Based on the CBRN 4 (STANAG 2103) field EXER 1 or OPER 1 plus the null character.

fixed_field.name: SetExerOperFlag
fixed_field.interpretation: Identifies if the Name set in ExerOperName is for an exercise or an operation.

variable_length_string.name: SetCallSign
variable_length_string.interpretation: Sets the call sign given for a CBRN sensor at the given station number. Based on the CBRN 4 (STANAG 2103) field ALFA 2 plus the null character.

fixed_field.name: SetPositioningMode
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the mode for determining the location of the payload.

fixed_field.name: SetPayloadSensitivity
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the payload sensitivity.

fixed_field.name: SetBackgroundLevelSubtractMode
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates whether the defined background value should be subtracted from any payload reading values or not.

fixed_field.name: SetBackgroundLevelMode
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the mode for determining the background level.

fixed_field.name: SetBackgroundLevel
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the background level when background level mode is set to manual.

fixed_field.name: SetDetectionMode
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the detection mode. Note that 'Standby' typically means that agent detection is not possible.

fixed_field.name: SetDetectionLevel
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the detection level for the payload. (applicable to CHEM).

fixed_field.name: SetDetectionOperationalThresholdLevel
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the detection threshold level value when the 'Detection Level = Operational Level'. This is a custom threshold level that will be applied against either field Contamination Level or Contamination Severity Level (Message: CBRN Detection) as selected by OCU and declared in ContaminationThresholdField.

fixed_field.name: SetDetectionLowThresholdLevel
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the detection threshold level value when the 'Detection Level = Low Level'. This is a custom threshold level that will be applied against either field Contamination Level or Contamination Severity Level (Message: CBRN Detection) as selected by OCU and declared in ContaminationThresholdField.

fixed_field.name: SetDetectionThresholdDelay
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the threshold delay which defines how long the detection value must be equal to or greater than the threshold (as declared in ContaminationThresholdField) before the payload would alarm. This can be used to reduce false alarms.

fixed_field.name: SetSamplingInterval
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the payload sampling interval. The interval is defined as 'start of sampling period to next start'. For example, if a 10 min sample is taken 'on the hour' then the interval is set to 60 minutes. 0 = Not Set

fixed_field.name: SetSamplingDuration
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the payload sampling duration. 0 = Not Set

fixed_field.name: SetSamplingVolume
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the payload sampling volume.

fixed_field.name: SetAudioLevel
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the audio level for the alarm enunciation.

fixed_field.name: SetDetectionAboveThresholdUpdateFrequency
fixed_field.interpretation: Determines the frequency at which the payload will send updated CBRN4 while in an alarm state for a given threat. If the frequency is set to zero then the payload will send the CBRN4, for a given threat, based on sensor determined logic.

variable_length_string.name: SetLocationLabel
variable_length_string.interpretation: Sets a user friendly location label.

variable_length_string.name: SetGroupLocationLabel
variable_length_string.interpretation: Sets a user friendly label for the location of a group of sensors.

fixed_field.name: SetCBRN4DeliveryMode
fixed_field.interpretation: Configures whether a CBRN4 product will be sent with every CBRNDetection Message or only those related to threats (above threshold, above threshold update and NIL measurements).

fixed_field.name: SetLanguage
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the payload interface language.

message_def.name: CBRNDisplayConfigurationCommand
message_def.description:
The CBRN Payload Display Configuration Command (Message #F929) shall be sent by the OCU to instruct a given CBRN payload station to configure its display parameters such as setting the display contrast.
The service shall reply with the CBRNConfigurationState (Message #F933). Based on STANAG 4586; Message #0212.

fixed_field.name: Timestamp
fixed_field.interpretation: UTC POSIX-style time in seconds since 1 January 1970

fixed_field.name: StationNumber
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitwise station number: 0x00000001 = Stn #1 ... 0x80000000 = Stn #32; 0=All stations

fixed_field.name: SetDisplayBrightnessLevel
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the brightness of the display.

fixed_field.name: SetDisplayMode
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the display mode.

fixed_field.name: SetDisplayContrast
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the percentage of the display contrast.

fixed_field.name: SetOtherVisualIndicatorsBrightnessLevel
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the brightness of other visual indicators (e.g., LED lamps).

message_def.name: CBRNScanWindowConfigurationCommand
message_def.description: The Payload Scan Window Configuration Command (Message #F92A) shall be sent by the OCU to instruct a given payload station to configure its scan window parameters. Based on STANAG 4586; Message #0213.

fixed_field.name: Timestamp
fixed_field.interpretation: UTC POSIX-style time in seconds since 1 January 1970

fixed_field.name: StationNumber
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitwise station number: 0x00000001 = Stn #1 ... 0x80000000 = Stn #32; 0=All stations

fixed_field.name: SetStartScanWindowAzimuth
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the payload’s start scan azimuth. Relative to true north.

fixed_field.name: SetEndScanWindowAzimuth
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the payload’s end scan azimuth. Relative to true north.

fixed_field.name: SetScanWindowMinElevation
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the payload's minimum elevation. Relative to local horizontal.

fixed_field.name: SetScanWindowMaxElevation
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the payload's maximum elevation. Relative to local horizontal.

fixed_field.name: SetAzimuthScanRate
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the payload's azimuth scan rate.

fixed_field.name: SetElevationScanRate
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the payload's elevation scan rate.

fixed_field.name: SetScanMode
fixed_field.interpretation: Sets the payload's scan mode.

message_def.name: CBRN4
message_def.description: This message shall be sent by a service containing the payload product in this case an ATP-45 (E) CBRN Textual Report.

fixed_field.name: Timestamp
fixed_field.interpretation: UTC POSIX-style time in seconds since 1 January 1970

fixed_field.name: StationNumber
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitwise station number: 0x00000001 = Stn #1 ... 0x80000000 = Stn #32; 0=All stations

fixed_field.name: CBRN4ReportID
fixed_field.interpretation: The report reference is an identifier associated with the CBRN Detection. 0=Not Assigned.

variable_length_string.name: CBRN4
variable_length_string.interpretation: The payload product (i.e., the detection data) is compiled in accordance with ATP-45 (E), STANAG 2103 as a CBRN 4 Report.

message_def.name: CBRNDetection
message_def.description: The CBRN Detection (Message #F931) shall be used to report basic contamination related measurements from a given CBRN payload station. CBRN4ReportReference, shall provide a reference to retrieve the actual payload product. The payload product (i.e., the detection data) is compiled in accordance with ATP-45 (E), STANAG 2103 as a CBRN 4 Report. Detailed measurements such as spectra data can be requested from the payload using CBRNDetailedInfoRequest. If an above threshold (or NIL) measurement is detected and no OCU is connected, then the service shall send this message (unsolicited) to a multicast group. A CBRN payload that detects more than one agent shall send a separate CBRNDetection for each agent detected. A CBRN payload with meteorological capability shall provide meteorological data as part of the CBRN4. CBRN detectors must report the detection location related fields (Latitude, Longitude and Altitude) and/or the area related fields.

fixed_field.name: Timestamp
fixed_field.interpretation: UTC POSIX-style time in seconds since 1 January 1970

fixed_field.name: StationNumber
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitwise station number: 0x00000001 = Stn #1 ... 0x80000000 = Stn #32; 0=All stations

variable_length_string.name: SubstanceDetected
variable_length_string.interpretation: Indicates the substance that was detected by the payload. Based on the CBRN 4 fields INDIA 2 (Substance Definition) or INDIAR 2 (Identification of the Material).

fixed_field.name: ContaminationLevel
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the level of contamination detected. Based on the CBRN 4 field ROMEO 1 (Contamination, Dose and Doserate/Dosage). Please Refer to STANAG 2103 for Applicable Range for Dose Rate and Contamination or Dose Level. Note that the ATP-45 use of Miosis is not applicable here for payloads. Payloads capable of Miosis mode are to declare it in fields with 'DetectionOperationalThresholdLevel' in CBRNConfigurationCommand and CBRNConfigurationState.

fixed_field.name: ContaminationLevelUoM
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the units of measurement for the level of contamination detected. Based on the CBRN 4 field ROMEO 1 (Contamination, Dose and Doserate/Dosage).

fixed_field.name: DetectionTimestamp
fixed_field.interpretation: UTC POSIX-style time in seconds since 1 January 1970

fixed_field.name: CBRN4ReportReference
fixed_field.interpretation: The report reference is an identifier associated with the CBRN payload product (i.e., CBRN 4 Report). The CBRN Detection will be provided as a CBRN 4 Report in accordance with ATP-45 (E), STANAG 2103. 0 = No More Information Available.

fixed_field.name: DistanceToCloud
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the estimated distance from payload to cloud. Based on the CBRN 4 field QUEBEC 6.

fixed_field.name: LeftRadialLine
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the orientation of the left radial line. Based on the CBRN 4 field QUEBEC 7.

fixed_field.name: RightRadialLine
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the orientation of the right radial line. Based on the CBRN 4 field QUEBEC 8.

fixed_field.name: CloudTopAngle
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the cloud top angle. Based on the CBRN 4 field QUEBEC 9.

fixed_field.name: CloudBottomAngle
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the cloud top angle. Based on the CBRN 4 field QUEBEC 10.

fixed_field.name: DetectionLatitude
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the latitude of the detection.

fixed_field.name: DetectionLongitude
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the longitude of the detection.

fixed_field.name: DetectionAltitude
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the altitude of the detection. Distance above (+) or below (-) the WGS-84 reference geoid.

message_def.name: RNDetailedMeasurement
message_def.description: This message shall be sent to a OCU containing the Radiological/Nuclear payload detailed sensor measurement. Based on STANAG 4586; Message #1743.

fixed_field.name: Timestamp
fixed_field.interpretation: UTC POSIX-style time in seconds since 1 January 1970

fixed_field.name: StationNumber
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitwise station number: 0x00000001 = Stn #1 ... 0x80000000 = Stn #32; 0=All stations

message_def.name: CBDetailedMeasurement
message_def.description: This message shall be sent to a OCU containing the Chemical/Biological payload detailed sensor measurement. Based on STANAG 4586; Message #1744.

fixed_field.name: Timestamp
fixed_field.interpretation: UTC POSIX-style time in seconds since 1 January 1970

fixed_field.name: StationNumber
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitwise station number: 0x00000001 = Stn #1 ... 0x80000000 = Stn #32; 0=All stations

message_def.name: CBRNOperatingState
message_def.description: The CBRN Payload Operating State (Message #F934) shall be sent OCU to report on the operating state for a given CBRN payload station such as current battery life or current GPS location. This message shall be sent as a response to the QueryCBRNOperatingState or after CBRNCommand. Based on STANAG 4586; Message #0311.

fixed_field.name: Timestamp
fixed_field.interpretation: UTC POSIX-style time in seconds since 1 January 1970

fixed_field.name: StationNumber
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitwise station number: 0x00000001 = Stn #1 ... 0x80000000 = Stn #32; 0=All stations

fixed_field.name: GPSFix
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates whether the payload is currently locked or not to a satellite.

fixed_field.name: PowerSource
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the payload's current power source.

fixed_field.name: BatteryRemaining
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the remaining battery life.

fixed_field.name: BatteryVoltage
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the voltage of the battery.

fixed_field.name: Uptime
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the total time since the sensor has been powered on.

fixed_field.name: PayloadState
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the payload state.

fixed_field.name: PayloadLatitude
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the latitude of the payload.

fixed_field.name: PayloadLongitude
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the longitude of the payload.

fixed_field.name: BackgroundLevel
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the background level in mSv that was either automatically detected by the payload or was manually set using CBRN payload configuration state command.

fixed_field.name: CommunicationMethod
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the current communication method used by the payload.

fixed_field.name: CommunicationSignalStrength
fixed_field.interpretation: Where applicable (e.g., Wireless) it indicates the signal strength of the communication method 'CommunicationMethod' used by the payload.

fixed_field.name: TemperatureState
fixed_field.interpretation: Commands the CBRN sensor at the given station number to reset its configuration state to the OEM defaults (ex. Display mode).

fixed_field.name: LocalAlarmEnunciationState
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicated the local alarm enunciation state.

fixed_field.name: InternalTime
fixed_field.interpretation: UTC POSIX-style time in seconds since 1 January 1970

fixed_field.name: OperatingMode
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the payload operating mode. Note that 'Standby' typically means that agent detection is not possible.

fixed_field.name: SamplingState
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the payload sampling state.

fixed_field.name: TestingState
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the testing state of the payload.

value_enum.enum_const: Power Distribution and Interface Logic Component Testing

message_def.name: CBRNConfigurationState
message_def.description: The CBRN Payload Configuration State (Message #F935) shall be sent to report on a given CBRN payload station configuration state. This message shall also be sent every time the configuration changes. This message shall otherwise be sent as a response to the CBRN Payload Configuration Command. If the 'Detection Level' is set to 'Operational Level' then the payload shall alarm when the 'Detection Operational Threshold Level' threshold is crossed. If the 'Detection Level' is set to 'Low Level' then the payload shall alarm when the 'Detection Low Threshold Level' threshold is crossed. The 'Detection Above Threshold Update Frequency' indicates the frequency at which the payload shall send CBRN4 while in an alarm state for a given threat. If the frequency is set to zero then the payload shall send the CBRN4, for a given threat, based on sensor determined logic. Based on STANAG 4586; Message #0310.

fixed_field.name: Timestamp
fixed_field.interpretation: UTC POSIX-style time in seconds since 1 January 1970

fixed_field.name: StationNumber
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitwise station number: 0x00000001 = Stn #1 ... 0x80000000 = Stn #32; 0=All stations

variable_length_string.name: ExerOperName
variable_length_string.interpretation: Indicates the Exercise or Operation name. Based on the CBRN 4 (STANAG 2103) field EXER 1 or OPER 1 plus the null character.

fixed_field.name: ExerOperFlag
fixed_field.interpretation: Identifies if the Name set in 'ExerOperName' is for an exercise or an operation.

variable_length_string.name: CallSign
variable_length_string.interpretation: Indicates the call sign given for the payload at the given station number. Maps to CBRN 4 (STANAG 2103) field ORGIDFT 1 plus the null character.

fixed_field.name: PositioningMode
fixed_field.interpretation: Identifies if the Name set in 'ExerOperName' is for an exercise or an operation.

fixed_field.name: PayloadSensitivity
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the payload sensitivity.

fixed_field.name: BackgroundLevelSubtractMode
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates whether the defined background value is subtracted from any sensor reading values or not.

fixed_field.name: BackgroundLevelMode
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the mode for determining the background level.

fixed_field.name: DetectionMode
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the detection mode. Note that 'Standby' typically means that agent detection is not possible.

fixed_field.name: DetectionLevel
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the detection level (applicable to CHEM).

fixed_field.name: DetectionOperationalThresholdLevel
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the detection threshold level value when the 'Detection Level = Operational Level'. This is a custom threshold level that will be applied against either field Contamination Level or Contamination Severity Level (Message: CBRN Detection) as selected by OCU and declared in ContaminationThresholdField.

fixed_field.name: DetectionLowThresholdLevel
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the detection threshold level value when the 'Detection Level = Low Level'. This is a custom threshold level that will be applied against either field Contamination Level or Contamination Severity Level (Message: CBRN Detection) as selected by OCU and declared in ContaminationThresholdField.

fixed_field.name: DetectionThresholdDelay
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the threshold delay which defines how long the detection value must be equal to or greater than the threshold (as declared in ContaminationThresholdField) before the payload would alarm. This can be used to reduce false alarms.

fixed_field.name: SamplingInterval
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the payload sampling interval. The interval is defined as 'start of sampling period to next start'. For example, if a 10 min sample is taken 'on the hour' then the interval is set to 60 minutes. 0 = Not Set

fixed_field.name: SamplingDuration
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the payload sampling duration. 0 = Not Set

fixed_field.name: SamplingVolume
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the payload sampling volume.

fixed_field.name: AudioLevel
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the audio level for the alarm enunciation.

fixed_field.name: DisplayBrightnessLevel
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the brightness of the display.

variable_length_string.name: ProductName
variable_length_string.interpretation: Indicates the payload product name (ex. FSD, VPBio).

variable_length_string.name: Identifier
variable_length_string.interpretation: Indicates an OEM specific identifier such as serial number. Maps to CBRN 4 (STANAG 2103) field MSGID 4 plus the null character.

variable_length_string.name: SWFirmwareVersion
variable_length_string.interpretation: Indicates the payload software or firmware version.

fixed_field.name: PayloadCBRNType
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the payload CBRN type.

fixed_field.name: PowerMode
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates whether the payload is powered on or off.

fixed_field.name: DetectionAboveThresholdUpdateFrequency
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the frequency at which the payload will send CBRN4 while in an alarm state for a given threat. If the frequency is set to zero then the payload will send the CBRN4, for a given threat, based on sensor determined logic.

fixed_field.name: StorageUtilisation
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the percentage of utilised storage space.

fixed_field.name: DisplayMode
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the display mode.

fixed_field.name: DisplayContrast
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates percentage of the display contrast.

fixed_field.name: Language
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the payload interface language.

fixed_field.name: Keyguard
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the keyguard state on the payload’s input device.

variable_length_string.name: GroupLocationLabel
variable_length_string.interpretation: A user friendly label for the location of a group of sensors.

fixed_field.name: ContaminationThresholdField
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates which contamination level field is to be used for warning and caution levels.

fixed_field.name: OtherVisualIndicatorsBrightnessLevel
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the brightness of other visual indicators (e.g., LED lamps).

fixed_field.name: CBRN4DeliveryMode
fixed_field.interpretation: Identifies whether a CBRN4 product will be sent with every CBRNDetection Message or only those related to threats (above threshold, above threshold update and NIL measurements).

message_def.name: CBRNScanWindowOperatingState
message_def.description:
The CBRN Payload Scan Window Operating State (Message #F936) send every time the scan operating state changes. This message shall otherwise be sent as a response to the CBRNScanWindowConfigurationCommand.
Based on STANAG 4586; Message #0312.

fixed_field.name: Timestamp
fixed_field.interpretation: UTC POSIX-style time in seconds since 1 January 1970

fixed_field.name: StationNumber
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitwise station number: 0x00000001 = Stn #1 ... 0x80000000 = Stn #32; 0=All stations

fixed_field.name: StartScanWindowAzimuth
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the payload's start scan azimuth. Relative to true north.

fixed_field.name: EndScanWindowAzimuth
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the payload's end scan azimuth. Relative to true north.

fixed_field.name: ScanWindowMinElevation
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the payload's minimum elevation. Relative to local horizontal.

fixed_field.name: ScanWindowMaxElevation
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the payload's maximum elevation. Relative to local horizontal.

fixed_field.name: AzimuthScanRate
fixed_field.interpretation: The payload's elevation scan rate.

fixed_field.name: ElevationScanRate
fixed_field.interpretation: The payload's elevation scan rate.

fixed_field.name: ScanMode
fixed_field.interpretation: The payload's scan mode.

fixed_field.name: ActualAzimuth
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the payload's actual azimuth.

fixed_field.name: ActualElevation
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the payload's actual elevation.

fixed_field.name: ScanRadius
fixed_field.interpretation: Indicates the payload's scan radius. A value of 0 indicates that the information is not available.
